unnormalised: Entertainment Buzz: Film Fest Season is ON!
normalised: Entertainment Buzz: Film Fest Season is ON!

unnormalised: Hey Bollywood buffs! Get your popcorn ready because film festival season is kicking off in full swing! From the Dharamshala International Film Festival nestled in the Himalayas to smaller, indie fests popping up in places like Pune and Kochi, there's something for every cinephile.
normalised: Hey Bollywood buffs! Get your popcorn ready because film festival season is kicking off in full swing! From the Dharamshala International Film Festival nestled in the Himalayas to smaller, indie fests popping up in places like Pune and Kochi, there's something for every cinephile.

unnormalised: Word on the street is that a bunch of promising debut directors are showcasing their work, and rumour has it that Karan Johar might just make a surprise appearance at the Jio MAMI Mumbai Film Festival, judging by his Insta stories.
normalised: Word on the street is that a bunch of promising debut directors are showcasing their work, and rumour has it that Karan Johar might just make a surprise appearance at the Jio M A M I Mumbai Film Festival, judging by his Insta stories.

unnormalised: This year, everyone's buzzing about films exploring themes of identity and social change, with a strong focus on stories from the North-East. Critics are already raving about a Manipuri film that screened in Delhi.
normalised: This year, everyone's buzzing about films exploring themes of identity and social change, with a strong focus on stories from the North-East. Critics are already raving about a Manipuri film that screened in Delhi.

unnormalised: Plus, many festivals are offering online screenings, so you can enjoy arthouse cinema even while tucking into some delicious biryani. And let's not forget the Onam celebrations often blending with the Kerala film fest vibes. Sounds like a full entertainment package, right? Keep an eye out for the award winners - you might discover your next favourite filmmaker!
